43eccce1c0443e2aa05619f72c7ef532a9b11d69.commit.message:
Added a constant for a default instance to DefaultConversionHandler.

It is safe to share an instance of this class between multiple components.
Therefore, a default instance can be defined and used anywhere.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516573 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
43eccce1c0443e2aa05619f72c7ef532a9b11d69.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

2cd86cf5b433144a5ab497a3c5d4257541d84961.commit.message:
Added a to() method to PropertyConverter expecting a DefaultConversionHandler.

This variant of the method obtains meta information required for the conversion
(e.g. the date format) from the conversion handler object rather than using an
Object array. The to() method operating on an Object array is going to be
removed after all calling references have been adapted.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516572 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
2cd86cf5b433144a5ab497a3c5d4257541d84961.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

7e403f1733bbafe24047e9fa18dc48cc1bc00f81.commit.message:
Added a property for the date format to DefaultConversionHandler.

This format string specified here will be used for conversions to Date or
Calendar objects.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516571 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
7e403f1733bbafe24047e9fa18dc48cc1bc00f81.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

d10c5b92f862b7c06dae19d281096002f864f4fb.commit.message:
Improved Javadocs of the getList() methods.

The Javadoc of the original getList() method was misleading; it did not mention
that the result list could contain complex object. This was corrected. It was
also tried to describe the differences between the different getList() methods.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1516570 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
d10c5b92f862b7c06dae19d281096002f864f4fb.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

bcbc29a607826bd91bd5abd39e399535c612270c.commit.message:
The standard get() methods are now implemented based on the generic method.

By making use of the generic get() conversion method the code size could be
reduced.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515449 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
bcbc29a607826bd91bd5abd39e399535c612270c.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

c92cf00e66b8b5215636a283eaed7f519e0a8f92.commit.message:
Implemented getStringArray() in terms of the generic getArray() method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515448 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
c92cf00e66b8b5215636a283eaed7f519e0a8f92.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

b8f73b2b6e06e6c68f132a26eecb69b76a2fe768.commit.message:
Added a missing toString conversion.

The to() method of PropertyConverter was lacking a trivial conversion to a
string. This feature is now available based to the toString() method.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515447 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
b8f73b2b6e06e6c68f132a26eecb69b76a2fe768.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

6f3d97ed43d0a671c20ed66069bbcb6613767009.commit.message:
Implemented the new generic get methods in AbstractConfiguration.

AbstractConfiguration now has a property of type ConversionHandler. The
implementations of the new methods delegate to this converion handler object.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515446 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
6f3d97ed43d0a671c20ed66069bbcb6613767009.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

2f493979071b0700490ff2e2637600f0fe079280.commit.message:
Added some generic get methods to the ImmutableConfiguration interface.

This is related to [CONFIGURATION-508]. These methods are a generic form of
specialized data type conversion methods. Added corresponding (non functional)
dummy implementations to AbstractConfiguration.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515445 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
2f493979071b0700490ff2e2637600f0fe079280.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

8e06178498e88eda790dc068f0c3cef3230268bc.commit.message:
Removed the interpolate() method from PropertyConverter.

In future PropertyConverter will be package protected and deal only with type
conversions.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1515444 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
8e06178498e88eda790dc068f0c3cef3230268bc.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger
